posts.title: My Profile
posts.text: 这篇博客主要用于记录自己做开发以来所遇见的一些问题和解决方法。 Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
